page.title: 13Moreton Mill and Whitegates
page.content: Moreton Mill is a dairy farm situated in 40 acres of land which is all down to grass.The farmer has cows, a bull and a few chickens.The farm used to be the village mill.There were five acres of pond which ran the mill but it has been filled in.The pond was higher than the house so when there was a lot of rain the pond flooded the yard and sometimes the house.The corn was ground between two large stones which can now be seen lying near the farmhouse. White Gates Farm covers 107 acres in 10 big fields.There are 2 farm workers.It is a dairy farm with 85 Friesian cows,43 heifers,6 calves and 20 hens.3 people live at White Gates Farm.There are 2 grazing fields.The cows are milked twice a day.
